Justice Mukheli (amụrụ na Soweto) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba South Africa, onye na-ese foto, na onye ọchụnta ego na-emepụta ihe. A maara ya maka ihe banyere ịmepụta nka ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke na-elekwasị anya na ahụmịhe Afrịka.

Ikpe ziri ezi gbara mgbasa ozi maka Ballantines n'afọ 2021 gburugburu mkpọsa ha Stay True: There were No Wrong Way. E gosipụtara Justice Mukheli na mbipụta nke anọ nke ihe ngosi nka nke oge a nke a makwaara dị ka Africa na Paris n'afọ 2019 dị ka onye na-ese foto.
